---
title: "q7 'Which of the following symptoms are most commonly associated with your primary health condition or underlying health conditions? (Please select all that apply)'"
author: "David Ritter"
date: "2/18/2020"
output: html_document
runtime: shiny
---

```{r, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(stringr)
source("helper.R")
```

```{r}
raw_data <- read.csv("data/master.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
```

```{r}
q5 <- 'Which.of.the.following.symptoms.are.most.commonly.associated.with.your.primary.health.condition.or.underlying.health.conditions...Please.select.all.that.apply.'
q5_final_response <- "X.43"
t <- "Which of the following symptoms are most commonly associated with your primary health condition or underlying health conditions? (Please select all that apply)"

q_data <- get_choose_all(raw_data, q.name = q5, f.response = q5_final_response) %>%
  tidy_choose_all()

q_n <- length(unique(q_data$id))
```

```{r}
q_plot <- clean_choose_all(q_data)
r <- plot_choose_all(q_plot)
r
```

```{r}
ggsave(filename = 'q7_symptoms.png', plot = r, device = 'png')
write.csv(q_plot, 'q7_symptoms_144.csv', row.names = FALSE)
write.csv(q_data, 'q7_symptoms_ids.csv', row.names = FALSE)
```

```{r}
qf_data <- q_data %>%
  filter(chosen == "Response text")
```

```{r}
qf_all_data <- 
  qf_data %>%
  inner_join(q_data, by = "id")

qf_n <- length(unique(qf_all_data$id))
```

```{r}
q_plot <- clean_choose_all_f(qf_all_data)
r <- plot_choose_all_f(q_plot)
r
```

```{r}
ggsave(filename = 'q7_symptoms.png', plot = r, device = 'png')
write.csv(q_plot, 'q7_symptoms_n#.csv', row.names = FALSE)
write.csv(qf_data, 'q7_symptoms_ids.csv', row.names = FALSE)
```
